attributes.action: Band Children buying Razors and seeing Adverts on removal of blades. Self Harm.
attributes.additional_details: An ages restriction on buying Razors in all Shops. Adverts on social media and online videos showing how to open a razors, Band!!. Please help Protect young people Suffering from Depression and Self Harm. By  not making it so easy to access Razors.
attributes.background: Self harm is a Growing Trend in young People which needs to be addressed. Just as children are band from buying achole, cigerettes, Knife etc. Razors should have a band and age limit to purchase. Self harm is another addiction, just like a drug. Society should be aware

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

There are already age limits on selling razor blades (other than safety razors), so we're not sure exactly what you'd like to change. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
